段: 從前ti7 亞美利加hit 州e5百姓不止歹風俗，就是in bat買人做奴才。Chiah-e5 奴才有e5 真艱苦，因為in 主人惡心歹款待in。

Chiong5-cheng5 ti7 A-bi2-li7-ka hit chiu e5 peh-seN3 put-chi2 phaiN2 hong-siok8, chiu7-si7 in bat be2 lang5 cho3 lou5-chai5. Chiah-e5 lou5-chai5 u7-e5 chin kan-khou2, in-ui7 in chu2-lang5 ok-sim phaiN2 khoan2-thai7 in.
今ti7 某所在有一個查甫囡仔hou7 人做奴才。有一日伊有聽見一位牧師teh 講起耶穌e5 道理；心liam5-piN 受感激，欣羨意愛這個耶穌做伊e5救主。伊無甚物明白道理e5 意思；不過有受牧師e5 苦勸，就是講著疼耶穌，tauh8-tauh8 祈禱上帝，求伊幫贊。聽了hit 個囡仔心內teh 想beh照an2-ni 行，心就得著安慰，因為知ti7 天--裡有一位朋友會體貼伊e5 艱苦。

TaN ti7 bou2-sou2-chai7 u7 chit8 e5 cha-pou gin2-na2 hou7 lang5 cho3 lou5-chai5. U7 chit8 jit8 i u7 thiaN-kiN3 chit8 ui7 Bok8-su teh kong2 khi2 Ia5-sou e5 to7-li2; sim liam5-piN siu7 kam2-kek, him-soan7 i3-ai3 chit e5 Ia5-sou cho3 i e5 Kiu3-chu2. I bo5 sim2-mih8 beng5-pek8 to7-li2 e5 i3-su3; put-ko3 u7 siu7 Bok8-su e5 khou2-khng3, chiu7-si7 kong2 tioh8 thiaN3 Ia5-sou, tauh8-tauh8 ki5-to2 Siong7-te3, kiu5 i pang-chan7. ThiaN liau2 hit e5 gin2-na2 sim-lai7 teh siuN7 beh chiau3 an2-ni kiaN5, sim chiu7 tit tioh8 an-ui3, in-ui7 chai ti7 thiN--nih8 u7 chit8 ui7 peng5-iu2 e7 the2-thiap i e5 kan-khou2.
Tui3 hit-tiap8以後hit個囡仔gau5祈禱，那久那疼耶穌，常常數念伊，kap伊交陪。總是伊e5 主人不止m7 歡喜，m7 准伊來趁道理，放刁放轉講，「你若去祈禱，我就beh扑你。」

Tui3 hit-tiap8 i2-au7 hit e5 gin2-na2 gau5 ki5-to2, na2 ku2 na2 thiaN3 Ia5-sou, siong5-siong5 siau3-liam7 i, kap i kau-poe5. Chong2-si7 i e5 chu2-lang5 put-chi2 m7 hoaN-hi2, m7 chun2 i lai5 than3 to7-li2, pang3-tiau pang3-tng2 kong2, “Li2 na7 khi3 ki5-to2, goa2 chiu7 beh phah li2.”
Tui3 an2-ni-siN 囡仔雖然是餒志，m7-ku2 m7 敢放sak 祈禱；反轉是那熱心疼耶穌。逐日食下晝了，伊就去偏僻所在暗靜去祈禱，求上帝幫贊伊。

Tui3 an2-ni-siN gin2-na2 sui-jian5 si7 loe2-chi3, m7-ku2 m7 kaN2 pang3-sak ki5-to2; hoan2-tng2 si7 na2 jiat8-sim thiaN3 Ia5-sou. Tak8 jit8 chiah8 e7-tau3 liau2, i chiu7 khi3 phian-phiah sou2-chai7 am3-cheN7 khi3 ki5-to2, kiu5 Siong7-te3 pang-chan7 i.
有一日teh 祈禱e5 中間伊e5主人對hit tah過，有聽見hit個囡仔koh再teh 祈禱，就真受氣，近倚來喝伊，來罵，續講，「你m7-thang祈禱，我敢無禁你？你若koh祈禱，我beh扑到hou7 你死。」

U7 chit8 jit8 teh ki5-to2 e5 tiong-kan i e5 chu2-lang5 tui3 hit tah koe3, u7 thiaN-kiN3 hit e5 gin2-na2 koh-chai3 teh ki5-to2, chiu7 chin siu7-khi3, kin7-oa2 lai5 hoah i, lai5 me7, soa3 kong2,” Li2 m7-thang ki5-to2, goa2 kiam2 bo5 kim3 li2 ? Li2 na7 koh ki5-to2 , goa2 beh phah kau3 hou7 li2 si2. “
Hit 個囡仔聽見，心猶原是執訣，的確beh疼耶穌，beh做伊e5學生，家己想若phoe性命亦敢，總是無beh 放sak 耶穌。
Hit e5 gin2-na2 thiaN-kiN3,sim iu5-goan5 si7 chip-koat,tek-khak beh thiaN3 Ia5-sou, beh cho3 i e5 hak8-seng, ka-ti7 siuN7 na7 phoe seN3-mia7 iah8 kaN2, chong2-si7 bo5 beh pang3-sak Ia5-sou.
所以逐日照舊e5 款式去hit 所在祈禱；又koh hou7 主人聽見，hou7 伊扑到不止傷重。Hit個人續譏刺伊講，「耶穌thai3會無來幫贊你，m7-thang hou7 我扑？Che是an2-chaiN2-iuN7 leh？」

Sou2-i2 tak8 jit8 chiau3 ku7 e5 khoan2-sit khi3 hit sou2-chai7 ki5-to2; iu7-koh hou7 chu2-lang5 thiaN-kiN3, hou7 i phah kau3 put-chi2 siong-tiong7. Hit e5 lang5 soa3 ki-chhi3 i kong2, “ Ia5-sou thai3 e7 bo5 lai5 pang-chan7 li2, m7-thang hou7 goa2 phah? Che si7 an-chaiN2-iuN7 leh? ”
囡仔應講，「頭家ah！ 我thang出在你扑。我就hou7你扑到死，教我 m7-thang toe3耶穌，我亦是be7做tit；我實在beh 疼耶穌，實在beh疼耶穌。」Hit句連連講兩過 。

Gin2-na2 in3 kong2, “ Thau5-ke ah ! goa2 thang chhut-chai7 li2 phah. Goa2 chiu7 hou7 li2 phah kau3 si2; kah goa2 m7-thang toe3 Ia5-sou, goa2 iah8 si7 be7-cho3-tit; goa2 sit8-chai7 beh thiaN3 Ia5-sou, sit8-chai7 beh thiaN3 Ia5-sou.” Hit ku3 lian5-lian5 kong2 nng7 koe3.
主人聽見che話koh較大受氣，扑較傷重；koh流血，囡仔跋倒ti7 塗腳親像teh-beh死e5款式。主人koh譏刺講，「耶穌thai3會無來幫贊你，m7-thang hou7 我扑，che是an3-chaiN2-iuN7 ah？」

Chu2-lang5 thiaN-kiN3 che oe7 koh khah toa7 siu7-khi3, phah khah siong-tiong7; koh lau5-hoeh, gin2-na2 poah8-to2 ti7 thou5-kha chhin-chhiuN7 teh-beh si2 e5 khoan2-sit. Chu2-lang5 koh ki-chhi3 kong2, “ Ia5-sou thai3 e7 bo5 lai5 pang-chan7 li2, m7-thang hou7 goa2 phah, che si7 an3-chaiN2-iuN7 ah?”
Hit-tiap8 囡仔暈--去，lian5-chun2 be7講話，kan-ta用細仔聲應講，「頭家ah ！ 我iau2-ku2 beh 疼耶穌，iau2-ku2 beh疼耶穌。」講了，對hit-tiap8 就死--去。

Hit-tiap8 gin2-na2 hun7--khi3, lian5-chun2 be7 kong2-oe7, kan-ta eng7 se3-a2-siaN in3 kong2, “ Thau5-ke ah ! goa2 iau2-ku2 beh thiaN3 Ia5-sou, iau2-ku2 beh thiaN3 Ia5-sou. ” Kong2-liau2, tui3 hit-tiap8 chiu7 si2--khi3.
今問看ti7 教會內有甚物囡仔，抑是大人疼耶穌到an2-ni mah？
TaN mng7 khoaN3 ti7 kau3-hoe7-lai7 u7 sim2-mih8 gin2-na2, a2 si7 toa7-lang5 thiaN3 Ia5-sou kau3 an2-ni mah ?
咱e5主耶穌有bat講，「凡若ai3 救性命--e5，就的確會失落；因為我，來失落性命--e5，的確會救伊。」路加 9： 24。又koh講，「若是lin2雖罔受艱苦，莫tit驚惶，著盡忠批死；我的確beh hou7 你永活e5報賞，親像戴冕旒。」默示錄2： 10。

Lan2 e5 Chu2 Ia5-sou u7 bat kong2, “ Hoan7-na7 ai3 kiu3 seN3-mia7--e5, chiu7 tek-khak e7 sit-loh8; in-ui7 goa2, lai5 sit-loh8 seN3-mia7--e5, tek-khak e7 kiu3 i. ” Lou7-ka 9:24. Iu7-koh kong2, “Na7 si7 lin2 sui-bong2 siu7 kan-khou2, boh8-tit kiaN-hiaN5, tioh8 chin7-tiong phoe-si2; goa2 tek-khak beh hou7 li2 eng2-oah8 e5 po3-siuN2, chhin-chhiuN7 ti3 bian2-liu5. ” Bek8-si7-liok8 2:10
照an2-ni看，這個做奴才e5囡仔，伊為著耶穌失落伊e5性命，所以穩當得著報賞，親像戴冕旒e5款式。望上帝幫贊咱逐家做盡忠親像an2-ni-siN。

Chiau3 an2-ni khoaN3, chit e5 cho3 lou5-chai5 e5 gin2-na2, i ui7 tioh8 Ia5-sou sit-loh8 i e5 seN3-mia7, sou2-i2 un2-tang3 tit tioh8 po3-siuN2, chhin-chhiuN7 ti3 bian2-liu5 e5 khoan2-sit. Bang7 Siong7-te3 pang-chan7 lan2 tai7-ke cho3 chin7-tiong chhin-chhiuN7 an2-ni-siN.
